Hi,

I configured a crawl job using default settings. 
Now, I'm tweaking th=
e delay-factor and min-delay-ms values hoping 
I can speed up the time to f=
etch the queued up URLs.
However, even if I set both of their values to 0 (=
I checked the code,
in BdbFrontier if I set both to 0, there should not be =
any wait time).
However, no matter what I set to these two attributes, on a=
verage,
only 5 to 6 URLs are being fetch per 10 seconds.
How come? And sinc=
e the default number of toe-threads are 50, I'd 
expected close to 50 threa=
ds would be spawned and active at any 
instance fetching and processing URL=
s concurrently, right?
